title: How to Win Minecraft Survival Games

steps.headline: Find a server not prone to Hackers.
steps.description: Do this for a fair, fun game. Hackers simply ruin the game. Good servers with anti-hack programs include Mineplex and Hypixel

steps.headline: Don't be too careful, but not too brave.
steps.description: Being too brave could lead to your demise, while being too careful can as well. Find that fine line between bravery and carefulness.

steps.headline: If the server offers free kits, use one.
steps.description: It could save your life in the beginning if you don't want a cornucopia chest.

steps.headline: Experiment with kits, see which one is the better armoured.
steps.description: Remember, armor is more important than weapons at the beginning.

steps.headline: The timer ticks down to start the game, get ready.
Run in a different direction that no one else is going.
steps.description: You can find chests while no one finds them if you go in a direction stocked with chests. You might be able to run to center and check out one or two chests before taking a run.

steps.headline: Equip armor and weapons.
steps.description: Once you have some armor, equip them immediately so that you can last longer while players start to combat. Make sure you have a good weapon that you know how to use. Stone swords, and bow and arrows are good weapons to start with

steps.headline: Avoid combat if you can.
steps.description: Run away from other players at the start of the games, and don't engage in combat until you have some armor and weapons.

steps.headline: Keep an eye out for chests.
steps.description: They will provide food, armor, weapons, potions and other useful equipment that can be used to win. This is essential if you follow the next tip.

steps.headline: Run away from the bloodbath at the start of the Games.
steps.description: A lot of players kill each other in the rush for chests. If you run away, you have a much better chance of survival.

steps.headline: Preserve on food.
steps.description: Food is important for the survival games. Loot chests for food and if you're lucky enough, you'll find some food. If players are nice, they might even give you some food! Some great food is cake, mushroom stew, pumpkin pie, steak, and beef. You can eat cake numerous times and they refill your hunger quickly. Mushroom stew is really easy to make in survival games. Pumpkin pie does a huge refill on your hunger. Steak and beef also add food to your hunger bar.

steps.headline: Kill the enemy.
steps.description: Plan your kill so that you don't end up being killed. For example, you can devise a plan to sneak up on them or hit them all the way until they're at a cliff and eventually fall to their doom.

steps.headline: Team up with some people.
steps.description: A great way to progress in the survival games is to ally with someone that won't stab you in the back. Give a peace signal and offer something generous showing that you want to team. Or type in 'Team [username]?' in the chat and see if they say anything back. Also, once you have a team, let them give you gear and if you get a chance kill them(if it is a team of 4 or more, do not try to kill them).

steps.headline: Go back to cornucopia when chests have refilled.
steps.description: At some point of the game, the chests will refilled with all sorts of new treasure and goods. Run back to the center and browse the chests for items that are important and essential and who knows? You might find some diamond!

steps.headline: Craft.
steps.description: If you find some wheat you want to craft into bread, head to the center and craft it! You can be able to craft a diamond sword also and fight off the remaining!

steps.headline: Do not take chances/risks.
steps.description: You might come across a lever and then flip it. The lever would activate and it would be bad.

steps.headline: When entering a death match, run around until there are about one or two tributes remaining.
steps.description: Let them fight off each other and possibly barge in and take a swing.

steps.headline: Hit the last tribute.
steps.description: Use a bow if they start retreating and go behind them when swinging your sword at them.

steps.headline: Congrats!
steps.description: You just won the survival games using these helpful tips!

steps.headline: Join a server you have been on before.
steps.description: If you play on the same maps from before, you have a better chance of knowing more about it, such as where certain chests are located.

steps.headline: Once you have came to the starting point, wait until the countdown is finished.
Once it is done, sprint and run to the chests.
steps.description: Other people will be practically as fast as you, so get as much as you need quickly.

steps.headline: Dash away, and try not to waste hunger by continuing sprinting.
steps.description: Only do this if someone is chasing you, and you're in danger. Head where you see nobody else going, where you known a variety of chests are.

steps.headline: Continue your search for chests, and be sure to stock up on weapons, food, and armor.
steps.description: Hunger is very important in the games, and so are your defenses.

steps.headline: For extra help, team up with another player whom you can trust.
steps.description: If they have no defenses at all, and are scared, give them something that will convince them. (For example, a wooden sword, axe, etc.)

steps.headline: If anyone tries to kill you, know you aren't alone.
steps.description: Find a secret way to kill the player without them tricking you, like hit them and get them to fall of a cliff or tree, or hit them with an arrow and then attack with your sword.

steps.headline: When it is down to 3 players left, find a way for one other player to get distracted while killing the other one.
steps.description: Wait until one of them is dead, then try scaring them away to truce.

steps.headline: Keep hitting them with leftover arrows, and then sprint at them, and kill them with your sword.
steps.description: Congrats, you won the Hunger Games!

text: The basics Find a server not prone to Hackers. Do this for a fair, fun game. Hackers simply ruin the game. Good servers with anti-hack programs include Mineplex and Hypixel Don't be too careful, but not too brave. Being too brave could lead to your demise, while being too careful can as well. Find that fine line between bravery and carefulness. If the server offers free kits, use one. It could save your life in the beginning if you don't want a cornucopia chest. Experiment with kits, see which one is the better armoured. Remember, armor is more important than weapons at the beginning. The timer ticks down to start the game, get ready.  Run in a different direction that no one else is going. You can find chests while no one finds them if you go in a direction stocked with chests. You might be able to run to center and check out one or two chests before taking a run. Equip armor and weapons. Once you have some armor, equip them immediately so that you can last longer while players start to combat. Make sure you have a good weapon that you know how to use. Stone swords, and bow and arrows are good weapons to start with Avoid combat if you can. Run away from other players at the start of the games, and don't engage in combat until you have some armor and weapons. Keep an eye out for chests. They will provide food, armor, weapons, potions and other useful equipment that can be used to win. This is essential if you follow the next tip. Run away from the bloodbath at the start of the Games. A lot of players kill each other in the rush for chests. If you run away, you have a much better chance of survival. Priorities Preserve on food. Food is important for the survival games. Loot chests for food and if you're lucky enough, you'll find some food. If players are nice, they might even give you some food! Some great food is cake, mushroom stew, pumpkin pie, steak, and beef. You can eat cake numerous times and they refill your hunger quickly. Mushroom stew is really easy to make in survival games. Pumpkin pie does a huge refill on your hunger. Steak and beef also add food to your hunger bar. Kill the enemy. Plan your kill so that you don't end up being killed. For example, you can devise a plan to sneak up on them or hit them all the way until they're at a cliff and eventually fall to their doom. Team up with some people. A great way to progress in the survival games is to ally with someone that won't stab you in the back. Give a peace signal and offer something generous showing that you want to team. Or type in 'Team [username]?' in the chat and see if they say anything back. Also, once you have a team, let them give you gear and if you get a chance kill them(if it is a team of 4 or more, do not try to kill them). Go back to cornucopia when chests have refilled. At some point of the game, the chests will refilled with all sorts of new treasure and goods. Run back to the center and browse the chests for items that are important and essential and who knows? You might find some diamond! Craft. If you find some wheat you want to craft into bread, head to the center and craft it! You can be able to craft a diamond sword also and fight off the remaining! Do not take chances/risks. You might come across a lever and then flip it. The lever would activate and it would be bad. How to survive a Deathmatch When entering a death match, run around until there are about one or two tributes remaining. Let them fight off each other and possibly barge in and take a swing. Hit the last tribute. Use a bow if they start retreating and go behind them when swinging your sword at them. Congrats! You just won the survival games using these helpful tips! Another way to survive Join a server you have been on before. If you play on the same maps from before, you have a better chance of knowing more about it, such as where certain chests are located. Once you have came to the starting point, wait until the countdown is finished.  Once it is done, sprint and run to the chests. Other people will be practically as fast as you, so get as much as you need quickly. Dash away, and try not to waste hunger by continuing sprinting. Only do this if someone is chasing you, and you're in danger. Head where you see nobody else going, where you known a variety of chests are. Continue your search for chests, and be sure to stock up on weapons, food, and armor. Hunger is very important in the games, and so are your defenses. For extra help, team up with another player whom you can trust. If they have no defenses at all, and are scared, give them something that will convince them. (For example, a wooden sword, axe, etc.) If anyone tries to kill you, know you aren't alone. Find a secret way to kill the player without them tricking you, like hit them and get them to fall of a cliff or tree, or hit them with an arrow and then attack with your sword. When it is down to 3 players left, find a way for one other player to get distracted while killing the other one. Wait until one of them is dead, then try scaring them away to truce. Keep hitting them with leftover arrows, and then sprint at them, and kill them with your sword. Congrats, you won the Hunger Games!
sentences: The basics Find a server not prone to Hackers.
Do this for a fair, fun game.
Hackers simply ruin the game.
Good servers with anti-hack programs include Mineplex and Hypixel Don't be too careful, but not too brave.
Being too brave could lead to your demise, while being too careful can as well.
Find that fine line between bravery and carefulness.
If the server offers free kits, use one.
It could save your life in the beginning if you don't want a cornucopia chest.
Experiment with kits, see which one is the better armoured.
Remember, armor is more important than weapons at the beginning.
The timer ticks down to start the game, get ready.
Run in a different direction that no one else is going.
You can find chests while no one finds them if you go in a direction stocked with chests.
You might be able to run to center and check out one or two chests before taking a run.
Equip armor and weapons.
Once you have some armor, equip them immediately so that you can last longer while players start to combat.
Make sure you have a good weapon that you know how to use.
Stone swords, and bow and arrows are good weapons to start with Avoid combat if you can.
Run away from other players at the start of the games, and don't engage in combat until you have some armor and weapons.
Keep an eye out for chests.
They will provide food, armor, weapons, potions and other useful equipment that can be used to win.
This is essential if you follow the next tip.
Run away from the bloodbath at the start of the Games.
A lot of players kill each other in the rush for chests.
If you run away, you have a much better chance of survival.
Priorities Preserve on food.
Food is important for the survival games.
Loot chests for food and if you're lucky enough, you'll find some food.
If players are nice, they might even give you some food!
Some great food is cake, mushroom stew, pumpkin pie, steak, and beef.
You can eat cake numerous times and they refill your hunger quickly.
Mushroom stew is really easy to make in survival games.
Pumpkin pie does a huge refill on your hunger.
Steak and beef also add food to your hunger bar.
Kill the enemy.
Plan your kill so that you don't end up being killed.
For example, you can devise a plan to sneak up on them or hit them all the way until they're at a cliff and eventually fall to their doom.
Team up with some people.
A great way to progress in the survival games is to ally with someone that won't stab you in the back.
Give a peace signal and offer something generous showing that you want to team.
Or type in 'Team [username]?'
in the chat and see if they say anything back.
Also, once you have a team, let them give you gear and if you get a chance kill them(if it is a team of 4 or more, do not try to kill them).
Go back to cornucopia when chests have refilled.
At some point of the game, the chests will refilled with all sorts of new treasure and goods.
Run back to the center and browse the chests for items that are important and essential and who knows?
You might find some diamond!
Craft.
If you find some wheat you want to craft into bread, head to the center and craft it!
You can be able to craft a diamond sword also and fight off the remaining!
Do not take chances/risks.
You might come across a lever and then flip it.
The lever would activate and it would be bad.
How to survive a Deathmatch When entering a death match, run around until there are about one or two tributes remaining.
Let them fight off each other and possibly barge in and take a swing.
Hit the last tribute.
Use a bow if they start retreating and go behind them when swinging your sword at them.
Congrats!
You just won the survival games using these helpful tips!
Another way to survive Join a server you have been on before.
If you play on the same maps from before, you have a better chance of knowing more about it, such as where certain chests are located.
Once you have came to the starting point, wait until the countdown is finished.
Once it is done, sprint and run to the chests.
Other people will be practically as fast as you, so get as much as you need quickly.
Dash away, and try not to waste hunger by continuing sprinting.
Only do this if someone is chasing you, and you're in danger.
Head where you see nobody else going, where you known a variety of chests are.
Continue your search for chests, and be sure to stock up on weapons, food, and armor.
Hunger is very important in the games, and so are your defenses.
For extra help, team up with another player whom you can trust.
If they have no defenses at all, and are scared, give them something that will convince them.
(For example, a wooden sword, axe, etc.)
If anyone tries to kill you, know you aren't alone.
Find a secret way to kill the player without them tricking you, like hit them and get them to fall of a cliff or tree, or hit them with an arrow and then attack with your sword.
When it is down to 3 players left, find a way for one other player to get distracted while killing the other one.
Wait until one of them is dead, then try scaring them away to truce.
Keep hitting them with leftover arrows, and then sprint at them, and kill them with your sword.
Congrats, you won the Hunger Games!
